Welcome to IALSA tutorials . This website hosts a series of guides, tech notes, and articles on issues related to reproducible research. Produced and maintained by [iLifespan](https://ilifespan.org) lab at the University of Victoria, this resource helps [IALSA](ialsa.org) researchers  stay on the cutting edge of data science methods. 
</br>


For the Centre on Aging ([COAG](http://www.coag.uvic.ca/)) Fall 2014 Methodology Colloquium lecture series, please follow the [link](http://ialsa.github.io/COAG-colloquium-2014F/)
